title: Voleur HTB Medium
description: HackTheBox's active Windows machine focused on Active Directory enumeration and privilege escalation, protected by NTLM hash encryption to prevent spoilers and ensure only those who complete the machine can fully access its details.

title: Volnaya Forums HTB Bussines CTF 2025
description: This walkthrough details the exploitation of a web application in a white-box CTF scenario, where we have access to the source code. The goal is to retrieve the flag stored in /flag.txt, accessible via the /api/auth endpoint for the admin user. The application contains vulnerabilities including Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR), Broken Access Control, and Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), compounded by CORS restrictions that necessitate a webhook for data exfiltration. We combine these with a bot-based report system to achieve our objective.
